description:
This is extremely early WIP, so expect bad stuff! HOW TO CONTROLE (X-Box pad mostly so far!)
  • Left stick or WASD controls movement
  • Right stick controls camera
  • Analogue triggers (are RIP?) or WS for car speed
  • D-pad controls turret direction
  • X on pad or E on keyboard enters and leaves cars
  • Y is for jump or handbrake (which also is spacebar)
  • A fires turret inside car
  • Right stick button resets camera position

Restart the game by reloading the webpage.
